heroines.title: Spider Woman
heroines.description: Spider Woman's back story goes like this: When young Jessica Drew suffered uranium poisoning her father injected her with spider serum. She first appeared in Marvel Comics in 1977.

heroines.title: Storm
heroines.description: Storm is a gifted hand-to-hand combatant. She was trained extensively by her fellow X-Man Wolverine, and is also an excellent marksman with handguns.

heroines.title: Cat Woman
heroines.description: Cat woman has made countless comic book appearances since her debut in the 1940s.

heroines.title: Elektra
heroines.description: Elektra is an Olympic-level athlete and gymnast. She is also a superb hand-to-hand combatant and martial artist. She made her first appearance in 1981.
